content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.sap_esll (
	[MANDT] varchar(8000),
	[PACKNO] varchar(8000),
	[INTROW] varchar(8000),
	[EXTROW] varchar(8000),
	[DEL] varchar(8000),
	[SRVPOS] varchar(8000),
	[RANG] varchar(8000),
	[EXTGROUP] varchar(8000),
	[PACKAGE] varchar(8000),
	[SUB_PACKNO] varchar(8000),
	[LBNUM] varchar(8000),
	[AUSGB] varchar(8000),
	[STLVPOS] varchar(8000),
	[EXTSRVNO] varchar(8000),
	[MENGE] numeric(38,18),
	[MEINS] varchar(8000),
	[UEBTO] numeric(38,18),
	[UEBTK] varchar(8000),
	[WITH_LIM] varchar(8000),
	[SPINF] varchar(8000),
	[PEINH] numeric(38,18),
	[BRTWR] numeric(38,18),
	[NETWR] numeric(38,18),
	[FROMPOS] varchar(8000),
	[TOPOS] varchar(8000),
	[KTEXT1] varchar(8000),
	[VRTKZ] varchar(8000),
	[TWRKZ] varchar(8000),
	[PERNR] varchar(8000),
	[MOLGA] varchar(8000),
	[LGART] varchar(8000),
	[LGTXT] varchar(8000),
	[STELL] varchar(8000),
	[IFTNR] varchar(8000),
	[BUDAT] varchar(8000),
	[INSDT] varchar(8000),
	[PLN_PACKNO] varchar(8000),
	[PLN_INTROW] varchar(8000),
	[KNT_PACKNO] varchar(8000),
	[KNT_INTROW] varchar(8000),
	[TMP_PACKNO] varchar(8000),
	[TMP_INTROW] varchar(8000),
	[STLV_LIM] varchar(8000),
	[LIMIT_ROW] varchar(8000),
	[ACT_MENGE] numeric(38,18),
	[ACT_WERT] numeric(38,18),
	[KNT_WERT] numeric(38,18),
	[KNT_MENGE] numeric(38,18),
	[ZIELWERT] numeric(38,18),
	[UNG_WERT] numeric(38,18),
	[UNG_MENGE] numeric(38,18),
	[ALT_INTROW] varchar(8000),
	[BASIC] varchar(8000),
	[ALTERNAT] varchar(8000),
	[BIDDER] varchar(8000),
	[SUPPLE] varchar(8000),
	[FREEQTY] varchar(8000),
	[INFORM] varchar(8000),
	[PAUSCH] varchar(8000),
	[EVENTUAL] varchar(8000),
	[MWSKZ] varchar(8000),
	[TXJCD] varchar(8000),
	[PRS_CHG] varchar(8000),
	[MATKL] varchar(8000),
	[TBTWR] numeric(38,18),
	[NAVNW] numeric(38,18),
	[BASWR] numeric(38,18),
	[KKNUMV] varchar(8000),
	[IWEIN] varchar(8000),
	[INT_WORK] numeric(38,18),
	[EXTERNALID] varchar(8000),
	[KSTAR] varchar(8000),
	[ACT_WORK] numeric(38,18),
	[MAPNO] varchar(8000),
	[SRVMAPKEY] varchar(8000),
	[TAXTARIFFCODE] varchar(8000),
	[SDATE] varchar(8000),
	[BEGTIME] varchar(8000),
	[ENDTIME] varchar(8000),
	[PERSEXT] varchar(8000),
	[CATSCOUNTE] varchar(8000),
	[STOKZ] varchar(8000),
	[BELNR] varchar(8000),
	[FORMELNR] varchar(8000),
	[FRMVAL1] numeric(38,18),
	[FRMVAL2] numeric(38,18),
	[FRMVAL3] numeric(38,18),
	[FRMVAL4] numeric(38,18),
	[FRMVAL5] numeric(38,18),
	[USERF1_NUM] varchar(8000),
	[USERF2_NUM] numeric(38,18),
	[USERF1_TXT] varchar(8000),
	[USERF2_TXT] varchar(8000),
	[KNOBJ] varchar(8000),
	[CHGTEXT] varchar(8000),
	[KALNR] varchar(8000),
	[KLVAR] varchar(8000),
	[EXTREFKEY] varchar(8000),
	[INV_MENGE] numeric(38,18),
	[PER_SDATE] varchar(8000),
	[PER_EDATE] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/saptable/esll/*/*/*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.sap_esll
GO
